thread.title: Come Drink with Matt Welch at a Reason Happy Hour in L.A. Thursday at 5 p.m.! | Libertarian
thread.title_full: Come Drink with Matt Welch at a Reason Happy Hour in L.A. Thursday at 5 p.m.! | Libertarian

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Come Drink with Matt Welch at a Reason Happy Hour in L.A. Thursday at 5 p.m.! | Libertarian
text:
(Before It's News)
On Thursday, Oct. 8, The Reason Foundation’s swanky West Coast HQ will be flinging open its doors between 5 p.m. and 7 p.m. for booze and snacks and related bonhomie. Why? WHY NOT. Also, I’m in town, and very thirsty. The details:
What : Cocktails and more with Matt Welch and various other Reasontastic superfriends.
Where : Reason Foundation HQ, 5737 Mesmer Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90230
Why : Thursday, duh. Also, my Dad will be there, in case you like hearing stories about security clearances.
RSVP : A must, to Mary Toledo at mary.toledo@reason.org or 310-291-2245 .
See you there!
